DzBrickMaterial Class Reference
[Shader Mixer Classes]

Material that uses Shader Bricks to generate its shader. More...

Detailed Description

Material that uses Shader Bricks to generate its shader.

void DzBrickMaterial::setPointer ( const DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID,
short  pointerID,
DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework when reading a native file. Derived classes should override this method if they ever write out pointer values to the data file. This method will be called with the sectionID and pointerID that were given when writing the file out. The passed pointer may be shared so should not be deleted.

Parameters:
file The file being loaded
sectionID The ID of the file section being read
pointerID The ID of the pointer being read.
ptr The pointer being read.

Reimplemented from DzDefaultBrickUser.

Parameters:
settings The render settings to use

void DzBrickMaterial::startLoad ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Called by the framework just before section loading for this object begins. Derived classes can override this method to perform preparatory operations to reading their file data.

Parameters:
file The file being read.
